name: Project 1
Description: I created a recipe search app that searched an api database by ingredient or name.

name: Project 2
Description: I created a pizza order creating and tracking app that allowed employees to login with pin

name: Coding Quiz
Description: I created a quiz for coders, that allows the user to track high scores and is also timed.

name: User Directory
Description: I created a user directory on React that displayed all employees and filtered by name as well as sorted by first and last name.

name: Budget Tracker App
Description: I created a budget tracking app that worked with a service worker and allowed user to interface offline.

name: Project 3
Description: I created a marketplace app that allows users to search more broadly by location and allowed the user to post items as well.
